subject: RE: [junit] Which tests to write?
msgSnippet: What about changing a sort-algorithm from bubblesort to mergesort totally? Aren t the boundary conditions for these two very different? Regards, Ilja ... From:
messageBody:
What about changing a sort-algorithm from bubblesort to mergesort
totally? Aren't the boundary conditions for these two very different?

Regards, Ilja

-----Original Message-----
From: Johannes Link [mailto:john.link@...]
Sent: Mittwoch, 8. Mai 2002 10:35
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] Which tests to write?

But probably you are right and the sort example is not as good as I
thought
in the beginning. So I declare myself defeated until I come up with an
example that makes sense as is and not only when considered in an
abstract
way.

Johannes
